morning.text: Good morning. And so begins the first day of the month in which you'll complete your story. Feeling excited?

A.text: Try to eat when you get the chance.

B.text: Good to hear. I just had a grilled cheese sandwich and it was as wonderful as I'd imagined.

evening.text: Evening. It's been a long day, hasn't it? It's good to relax.

midnight.text: It's pretty late. If you want to write now, you can, but I'd otherwise recommend getting some sleep. There's a whole month ahead of us.

ultra_late.text: ... Agh! Could you give a bit of warning before you pop up like a serial killer in a movie? I didn't know you'd be awake now... Ahem.
